premise_source_doc_sentence: However , this conclusion is contested , as the Thracians at Pydna also had white shields  (  as did many other Hellenistic thureophoroi or auxiliary infantry from the period  )  so the reference may simply refer to these and there may not have been a corps of `` white shields '' within the phalanx at all .
